resources.string: Credentials are required to authenticate account \"%1$s\", but none were available. It will be necessary to log in manually.
Could not load the existing account with ID %1$d
Failed to copy Adobe DRM rights information for book \"%1$s\".
Failed to copy book \"%1$s\" to new database.
Failed to copy bookmarks for book \"%1$s\".
Could not parse a bookmark for book \"%1$s\".
Book %1$s is of an unexpected format (%2$s).
Found an account with an unrecognized ID: %1$d. It cannot be migrated.
The account \"%1$s\" does not actually require credentials.
